dcterms:description: A platform for interactive multi-modal physical simulation that allows for the generation of egocentric-vision images and the recording of navigational information.
dcterms:title: ThreeDWorld

dcterms:description: A dataset collected from the ThreeDWorld environment, consisting of 14,767 high-quality images generated from a continuous trajectory through a furnished indoor environment.
dcterms:title: The dataset collected from the ThreeDWorld environment
